introductionParagraphs.text: My name is Will Roberts, and I'm a pretty normal guy. But you can read more about that on my personal profile page.

I'm a web developer with a degree in Software Engineering. My main skills lie in building websites with JEE and the Spring and Hibernate frameworks. I like to think I'm a pretty solid full stack developer and enjoy working with databases and on the front-end with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

I am a big supporter of the Agile methodology and believe that continuous integration is the way forward - if you can release code at any time, you can fix code at any time and you can update code at any time.
This site is built using AngularJS and Twitter Bootstrap, with no server-side code, to keep things simple (and cheap). **** UPDATE THIS AFTER UPLOADING TO AWS ****
You can find out some basic stuff about me lower down the page, or view my online resume here.
